name: Octlantis
description:
This Unity game project was completed December 2021 as my 3rd complete game project. This game was designed in just less than 3 days, therefore the content is less of that in the other projects.

Octlantis is a top-down shooter where you pilot a rebel octopus and take down the 2 predatorial tyrants, Brutus and Sam. Using only your ink as your weapon, will you be able to survive?
